title: Extension host terminated unexpectedlly

node.body: Please disable all extensions, restart VS Code, then enable them one by one until you discover which one crashes the Extension Host (EH) process.

node.body:
> > Extension Host log


> how to open Extension Host log in the Output panel?

Click on errors and warnings numbers on status bar, even if they are zeroes. This will open the panel. Select its Output tab. Then use dropdown to go to EH log.
node.bodyText:
Extension Host log



how to open Extension Host log in the Output panel?

Click on errors and warnings numbers on status bar, even if they are zeroes. This will open the panel. Select its Output tab. Then use dropdown to go to EH log.

node.body: https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/issues/94869#issuecomment-611901305 confirmed Quick Heal "repairs" a VS Code file. Please report this to the AV vendor as a false positive.

node.body: I am also getting same issue, i have removed all extension from VSCode and also uninstall and reinstall VSCode V-1.44 and also disable antivirus from my system, I was using QuickHeal anti virus but now its disable, i have tried many time, last 2 days, but bad luck, can you please let me know what i can do?
